helpMsg:
I'm the DrinkingJengaBot!
Use these commands to play:
â€¢ !join - Join the game!
â€¢ !start - Begin the game
â€¢ !draw - Draw a card when it's your turn
â€¢ !decline - If you don't like your tile, you can skip it (though this invokes a penalty shot)
â€¢ !turn - See whose turn it is
â€¢ !order - See the full order of turns
â€¢ !tilesleft - See how many tiles are left in the game
â€¢ !admins - See who is currently an admin
â€¢ !leave - Leave the game ðŸ˜¢
adminHelpMsg:
Admin commands:
â€¢ !reset - Reset the game to play again
â€¢ !shuffle - Shuffle the tiles!
â€¢ !sameroom [true|false] - Set same-room mode
â€¢ !boot <username> - Boot an inactive player from the game
â€¢ !kick - Same as boot
â€¢ !skip - Skip the current turn
â€¢ !addmin <username> - Add an admin
â€¢ !removeadmin <username> - Remove an admin
â€¢ !clearusers - Clear the user list
â€¢ !end End the game and kick all players
unauthorizedMsg: Sorry, you don't have permission to use that command. Have Abe or Michael (or a current Admin) give it a go ðŸ˜‰
gameOverWarn: Game is over! Reset the game with !reset to play again.
gameOverMsg: GG everyone! If you want to play again, use !reset.
wrongUserWarn: Whoops, looks like you aren't the most recent player.
unknownCmd: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Use !help to see available commands.
resetMsg: Game has been reset and is ready to go!
sameRoomMsg: We are in the same room!
apartMsg: We are NOT in the same room.
notYourTurnWarn: Wait a second, it's not your turn. Wait your turn or !join.
noUsersWarn: No users have joined the game.
alreadyJoinedWarn: Hang on there bucko, you're already in the game ðŸ˜‘
gameEndMsg: Game ended. Use !join and !start to get things back up and running.
noAdminsWarn: Whoop! Looks like there are no admins in the game at the moment. If you need one, ask Abe or Michael to admin someone. They're always admins ðŸ˜‰
